coreAttributes.name: Karen
coreAttributes.description: The weakest of the 4 Days Series, it's name is thanks to the Person whose Body was used as a Base, Kamine Renegade, at his Prime he was one of the most Powerful Demons rivalled only by Lilith in her Prime.
coreAttributes.equipText: As you take hold of Karen you can feel an enormous amount of demonic energy seeping into your Body
coreAttributes.unequipText: As you Sheath Karen the Immeasurable Amount of Energy suddenly fades straight off into nothingness

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] Karen at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade travels through [npc2.her] body! due to it being a Mythic Sword it leaves no Damage on the Body of [npc2.name] and only affects their Energy
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Karen, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the Demonic blade travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Karen, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the Demonic blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Karen, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Karen, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
